attributes.action: Insist on the scrapping of the £400,000 Olympics Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People to petition the government to insist that the 2012 London Olympics logo be scrapped and the £400,000 fee be withheld.
At a time when spiralling costs of the Olympics are the main concern of the people of London, a competition should be held to allow the citizens to design and choose the logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
